definition: to divide into portions/to package in smaller quantities/to separate into loads

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: A: We need our order separated into three different boxes .
sentences.chinese: 我们订的货需要分装三箱。

sentences.english: Keep portions in sandwich bags to get you through the day.
sentences.chinese: 分装到三明治袋里，那你的一天就有着落了。

sentences.english: He says that there are many different filtering methods used by beekeepers and honey packers.
sentences.chinese: 他说养蜂人和蜂蜜分装工人使用的过滤方法有很多种。

sentences.english: These people must have at least three years of repacking experience.
sentences.chinese: 这些人必须至少有三年的分装管理经验。

sentences.english: Flammable liquids in use should be properly stored in safety dispensing containers.
sentences.chinese: 使用中的可燃性液体须用安全的分装容器妥善储存。

sentences.english: Buy the bigger package of snacks and repackage them into smaller bags yourself.
sentences.chinese: 买大包装的零食，自己分装成小包装。

sentences.english: The seafood was offloaded into some 150 trucks.
sentences.chinese: 这批海鲜被分装到150余辆卡车上。

sentences.english: Divide among serving plates and season with pepper to serve.
sentences.chinese: 分装到盘子中，洒上胡椒就可以了。

sentences.english: You can find it in teabag form in most grocery stores.
sentences.chinese: 在很多的杂货店你可以找到以茶包形式分装的茶叶。

sentences.english: The Repacking Director is responsible for any repacking units subcontracted to your company.
sentences.chinese: 分装管理责任者负责公司所有契约的分装单位。

sentences.english: The Repacking Director is responsible for any repacking units subcontracted to your company.
sentences.chinese: 分装管理责任者负责公司所有契约的分装单位。

sentences.english: Is the grading department separate from both repacking and sales departments?
sentences.chinese: 达规判定部门是否独立于分装和销售部门？

definition: loose goods/goods sold open/draft (of beer, as opposed to bottled)
sales counter dedicated to a certain kind of product (e.g. alcohol)
online purchase of goods dispatched from overseas
